Member Data Documentation

int DatagramSocket::c_udp_proto_nbr [static, protected]
 

The protocol number for UDP.

Statically initialized if _MFC_VER is not defined. Visual C++ needs winsock to be initialized before getprotobyname can be called but in linux we have a problem with getprotobyname when called in different threads at the same time
